```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(viridis)

# Import data from github

agencies <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-01-15/agencies.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

launches <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-01-15/launches.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)


# Get better date format in lauches
launches <- launches %>% 
  mutate(launch_date = ymd(launch_date))

# Improve countries from agencies
launches$agency %>% unique()
launches$state_code %>% unique()

launches %>% 
  mutate(state_code = )
```
